titleInfo.title: Silva v. Wall, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 2 Motion for Leave to Proceed in forma pauperis. Signed by Magistrate Judge Lincoln D. Almond on 8/3/05. (Theall, Jeannine)

titleInfo.title: Silva v. Wall, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER ordering that the State, within 10 days, either produce copies of all documents regarding Petitioner's May 16, 1999 and June 14, 1999 incarcerations, or file a response to Petitioner's Motion outlining the basis for its objection to production. Signed by Magistrate Judge Lincoln D. Almond on 9/6/05. Forwarded to all counsel of record.(Theall, Jeannine)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:05-cv-00109; Silva v. Wall, et al;

titleInfo.title: Silva v. Wall, et al
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS recommending that the State's Motion to Dismiss (#13) be Granted and Silva's Amended Petition be Dismissed in its entirety. This Court also recommends that Silva's numerous other pending Motions (#4,5,8,11,14,17,21,22) all be Denied as moot in view of this recommended disposition and that Final Judgment be entered in favor of the State 4 Motion for JoinderMotion for Miscellaneous ReliefMotion to CompelMotion to Appoint CounselMotion to CompelMotion to Amend/CorrectMotion for Extension of Time filed by James J. Silva,, 13 MOTION to Dismiss filed by Patrick Lynch,, 5 MOTION for Removal filed by James J. Silva,, 22 MOTION to Expand the Record re 21 MOTION for Immediate Habeas Corpus Relief, to Sensure Asst. Attorney General Steven A. Regime, for an Immediate Conference with Judge, and to Expand the Record. filed by James J. Silva,, 14 MOTION filed by James J. Silva,, 21 MOTION for Immediate Habeas Corpus Relief, to Sensure Asst. Attorney General Steven A. Regime, for an Immediate Conference with Judge, and to Expand the Record. filed by James J. Silva,, 11 MOTION for Copies of Pleadings filed by James J. Silva,, 17 MOTION to Compel Specific Discovery MOTION for Extension of Time MOTION for Extension of Time MOTION MOTION MOTION to Stay MOTION to Stay filed by James J. Silva,, 8 MOTION for Removal filed by James J. Silva, Objections to R&R due by 12/13/2005. Signed by Magistrate Judge Lincoln D. Almond on 11/29/05. Sent to parties.(Theall, Jeannine)
